Project1.name: Project Annapurna
Project1.desc: With thousands of NGOs listed down, the user can simply filter out the most relevant ones to start a conversation. Following the outcome of the conversation, the NGO can reach the spot after the completion of the program to collect the food bulk to further distribute it amongst the needful.

Project2.name: Project Durga
Project2.desc: Here comes the lioness of 21st century, who dream big and achieve bigger. Stay tuned to meet the wonder women of this century.

Project3.name: Project Travelog
Project3.desc: This is a platform where students from our college can share their travel experiences and adventures with the community. Whether you're planning a trip or just want to be inspired by others' journeys, this is the place to be.
